name: Dear Ronnie... (Demo 1)
description:
Ronnie Radke is a drugged out "rock star" who has recently been arrested for drug possession. Going through withdrawals in prison, Ronnie must fight to better himself and change his ways.

While making this game, I wanted to capture the real topic of drug overdoses and addiction issues. Taking a well known topic, where a celebrity falls victim to this theme, I hope to reach a wide audience and have them all reach a point of common understanding.

This game was created by Jesse Von Paratore.
